snippet: Three days after a raucous debate in Colorado, several candidates speaking in Des Moines took shots at their new common enemy: moderators.
abstract: Several Republican presidential candidates react to fallout from disorderly debate in Colorado by targeting debate moderators, rousing many in Republican base to agree with accusations that mainstream media supports Democrats; representatives of several GOP candidates plan to jointly draft strategy for pressuring television networks and Republican National Committee to modify rules for upcoming debates.

byline.contributor: Ashley Parker contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Three days after a raucous debate in Colorado, several candidates speaking in Des Moines took shots at their new common enemy: moderators.

headline.main: Anger Over Debate Fills Iowa Republican Forum
headline.print_headline: Anger Over Debate Fills a G.O.P. Forum in Iowa
